Repeat: knit next stitch, then (slip the stitch just knitted back onto left needle and knit it again through back loop) 3 times, k3
knit next stitch, then (slip the stitch just knitted back onto left needle and knit it again through back loop) 3 times, k3
End Row: knit next stitch, then (slip the stitch just knitted back onto left needle and knit it again through back loop) 3 times, k1
